description: J.H. Johnson provides a safe environment that promotes high academic achievement, instills character and empowers students to be productive citizens. Students are engaged in interdisciplinary activities through the integration of media and technology. They are encouraged to contribute positively to their communities and move towards college and career readiness. All stakeholders are expected to demonstrate pride and leadership skills in order to promote a legacy of achievement.
transit: W8 (Garfield-Anacostia Loop Line), 92 (U Street-Garfield Line), 94 (Stanton Road Line)
